# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

if(CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_BINARY_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "In-tree builds are not supported. Run CMake from a separate directory: cmake -B build")
endif()

set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr and automatically regenerate CMakeLists.txt
	include(cmkr.cmake OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)

	# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

project(antireport)

if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT AND NOT CMKR_DISABLE_VCPKG)
	include(FetchContent)
	# Fix warnings about DOWNLOAD_EXTRACT_TIMESTAMP
	if(POLICY CMP0135)
		cmake_policy(SET CMP0135 NEW)
	endif()
	message(STATUS "Fetching vcpkg (2025.12.12)...")
	FetchContent_Declare(vcpkg URL "https://github.com/microsoft/vcpkg/archive/refs/tags/2025.12.12.tar.gz")
	FetchContent_GetProperties(vcpkg)
	if(NOT vcpkg_POPULATED)
		FetchContent_Populate(vcpkg)
		include("${vcpkg_SOURCE_DIR}/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake")
	endif()
endif()

# Packages
find_package(dpp REQUIRED)

find_package(OpenSSL REQUIRED)

# Target: antireport
set(CMKR_TARGET antireport)
set(CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS ON)

set(antireport_SOURCES
	"src/botHandler.hxx"
	"src/antireport.cxx"
	"src/botHandler.cxx"
	cmake.toml
)

add_executable(antireport)

target_sources(antireport PRIVATE ${antireport_SOURCES})
source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${antireport_SOURCES})

target_compile_features(antireport PRIVATE
	cxx_std_23
)

if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU" OR CMAKE_C_COMPILER_ID STREQUAL "GNU") # gcc
	target_compile_options(antireport PRIVATE
		-lpthread
		-Wshadow
		-Wall
		-Wextra
		-Werror
		-lz
	)
endif()

target_link_libraries(antireport PRIVATE
	dpp::dpp
	OpenSSL::SSL
)

get_directory_property(CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} DEFINITION VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
if(NOT CMKR_VS_STARTUP_PROJECT)
	set_property(DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR} PROPERTY VS_STARTUP_PROJECT antireport)
endif()
